[{'testCaseId': 'TC_LOGOUT_001', 'description': 'Successful logout from the application', 'preConditions': ['User is logged in'], 'steps': ['Navigate to the Log Out page', "Click on the 'Log Out' button"], 'expectedResult': "User is redirected to the login page with a confirmation message 'You have been successfully logged out'"}, {'testCaseId': 'TC_LOGOUT_002', 'description': 'Attempt to access protected pages after logout', 'preConditions': ['User is logged in', 'User has logged out'], 'steps': ['Click on a protected page link (e.g., Dashboard)', 'Attempt to access the page'], 'expectedResult': "User is redirected to the login page with a message 'Please log in to access this page'"}, {'testCaseId': 'TC_LOGOUT_003', 'description': 'Logout without prior login', 'preConditions': ['User is not logged in'], 'steps': ['Navigate to the Log Out page', "Click on the 'Log Out' button"], 'expectedResult': "User is redirected to the login page with a message 'You must be logged in to perform this action'"}, {'testCaseId': 'TC_LOGOUT_004', 'description': 'Session invalidation after logout', 'preConditions': ['User is logged in'], 'steps': ['Log out from the application', 'Attempt to use the session cookie to access an API endpoint'], 'expectedResult': 'API returns a 401 Unauthorized error due to invalid session'}, {'testCaseId': 'TC_LOGOUT_005', 'description': 'Logout button visibility for non-logged-in users', 'preConditions': ['User is not logged in'], 'steps': ['Navigate to the application homepage', "Check for the presence of the 'Log Out' button"], 'expectedResult': "The 'Log Out' button is not visible; only 'Log In' or 'Sign Up' buttons are visible"}]
